description: This file defines the ProviderRegistry class, which manages OAuth provider clients by registering available providers based on configuration properties and providing access to them via get and all methods.

classes.name: ProviderRegistry
classes.description: Manages OAuth providers by registering and providing access to provider clients based on application configuration.

methods.name: ProviderRegistry
methods.description: Constructor that initializes available OAuth providers from configuration properties.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the ProviderClient associated with the given provider name, throws exception if not found.
